text:
Athiya Shetty’s favourite Ka

Actor Athiya Shetty recently took to her Twitter handle and shared a selfie with her father and brother, writing, “With my fav Ka’s!! #KiAndKa @arjunk26.”

Actor Arjun Kapoor had earlier asked fans on Twitter to to send him their ‘Ki and Ka’ selfies: “People time to send me selfies with a twist all the Ki s take selfies with their favourite Ka and all the Ka s with their favourite Ki !!!” Celebrities Karan Johar, Parineeti Chopra, Hrithik Roshan, Varun Dhawan, Sonam Kapoor, Alia Bhatt and Ayushmann Khurrana have revealed their favourites. — ANI
title: Know who's Athiya Shetty's favourite Ka' s
